name: 2022 12th International Conference on Environmental Engineering and Applications
content: ICEEA 2022 Shining Points: 1 For papers submitted to ICEEA 2022, after the peer reviewing process by at least 2-3 experts, all the accepted papers will be published into International Conference Proceedings will be submitted to EI Compendex and Scopus for indexing. 2 About 10% excellent papers with extension will be recommended to publish in International Journal of Environmental Science and Development (IJESD, ISSN:2010-0264), and all papers will be indexed by Scopus and included in the Chemical Abstracts Services (CAS), CABI, Ulrich Periodicals Directory, Electronic Journals Library, Crossref, ProQuest. 3 Outstanding Professors :Prof. Roberto San Jose, Technical University of Madrid (UPM), Spain; Prof. Yanpeng Li, Chang'an University, Shaanxi, China and Assoc. Prof. Yubao Wang, Deputy Director of Shaanxi Economic Research Center, Xi 'an Jiaotong University, Shaanxi, China.
